meaningMnemonic: An <kanji>old</kanji> <kanji>tomb</kanji> is an <vocabulary>ancient tomb</vocabulary>. They're mostly from the <vocabulary>Kofun</vocabulary> period, and indeed that's where the period gets its name.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
